name: Orel
appearance: Star-scars along the forearms, hair flecked with silver dust, eyes that catch and return mothlight.
character: Calm, detached, and compassionate; speaks as if listening to older echoes.
talents: names spoken in his presence cling to his memory
sees faint lines of old bridges at dusk
dreams: prove the Prism Spire is a mind with purpose
trace the Skybridge to the sea's edge
secrets: keeps a shard of fused light with a trapped echo that says his name backwards
writes anonymous counsel for Magistrate Vela Orun
fears the Scar keeps his true name and will take it back
